short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A chrome extension to create prediction markets from tweets

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Right-click a tweet and create a prediction market on whether or not the tweet will be considered centrally true.

This extension requires a Manifold Markets API Key.
